reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Women Deliver is engaged in global advocacy work to promote women's equality and the achievement of MDG5. The organisation is preparing a global conference on maternal health to be held in 2013, with the aim of securing and updating commitments to reduce m aternal mortality by 2015 and beyond. Four consultations will be organised in the Spring of 2012 in order to collect region-specific views for the conference. The project is based around supporting the participation of representatives from developing count ries, particularly young thought leaders, to ensure the success of the consultation process.
